text: Gei ana dama daane huogodoo mo ana dama ahina huogodoo ga loomoi belee haga manawa lamalia a mee, gei mee hagalee hiihai gi manawa lamalia, ga helekai gi digaula, “Au e dangidangi hua beenei i dagu dama daane, gaa dae loo gi dogu hana gi baahi o mee i lodo tenua o digau mmade”, gei mee e dangidangi hua igolo i dana dama daane go Joseph.
